literals: "Closing amqp link locally since amqp link was closed remotely"
"Closing amqp session locally since amqp session was closed remotely"
"Stopping reactor now that connection is closed locally and remotely"
"Closing amqp connection locally since amqp connection was closed remotely"
"Closing amqp connection locally since amqp transport error was thrown"
"Closing amqp session locally since amqp link was closed locally"
"Closing amqp connection locally since amqp session was closed locally"
"Stopping reactor now that amqp connection is closed locally and remotely"
comments: Reactor should respond to this session close with onSessionLocalClose call, where we close the connection.
Cannot close the connection here because it can only be done when all of its sessions have closed
Reactor should respond to this connection close with onConnectionLocalClose call, where we close the reactor.
Cannot close the reactor here because it can only be done when all of its connections have closed
Only stop the reactor once the connection is closed locally and remotely

* Base Handler that logs connection/session/link opening. It also has logic to tear down the connection/session/link and
 * stop the reactor if the connection, session, and/or link is closed remotely. This base handler assumes a single link
 * in a single session in a single connection.
